derivation: a primitive root (perhaps rather identical with H578 (אָנָה) through the idea of contraction in anguish);
outline:
1. to meet, encounter, approach, be opportune
    1. (Piel) to allow to meet, cause to meet
    2. (Pual) to be sent, be allowed to meet
    3. (Hithpael) to seek occasion (quarrel), cause oneself to meet
kjv_def: befall, deliver, happen, seek a quarrel.
strongs_def: to approach; hence, to meet in various senses
